title: This New Year - Slow Down, It Doesn't Mean You're Lazy
description: Social Psychologist Devon Price says instead of viewing "laziness" as a deficit or something people need to fix or overcome with caffeine or longer work hours, think of it as a sign you probably need a break.  Short Wave has this episode from our colleagues at Life Kit.
